channel.title: Huge Guide on Recording Xbox 360 footage in multiple ways to make montage videos
channel.description:
Found this [b]after[/b] I bought the wrong capture card that did not work for 64 bit vista. I found this though and it helped me alot. It is a ton of guides with alot of different methods of recording xbox footage. It would work with other consoles but they concentrated on the xbox as most people make montage videos for it than anything.
Hope it helps somebody to get started recording. http://hubpages.com/hub/Guides-to-Recording-Xbox-360-Gameplay-to-Desktop-or-Laptop
